blog.name: numarii
blog.title: numari
blog.description: 1. the sense of grief that comes with the passing or injury of a fictional character, as if they are a real loved one.                                                                          2.  the frustration of not being able to spend time with a hurting or grieving fictional character, since respective realities are separated.

tags: WHAT IS THIS I FORGOT HOW TO WRITE
summary: When the Avengers come back after the snap death, Peter Quill and Peter Parker become close. A few days after they return, Quill...
body:
When the Avengers come back after the snap death, Peter Quill and Peter Parker become close. A few days after they return, Quill begins to notice how hard it was for Peter to die and then come back. He notices how much it has begun to affect him, and how much the pain has changed him. Peter Parker is quieter now. More serious. More reserved. He stands away from the rest of the crowd, and isn’t the bubbly, overenthusiastic kid that Tony told Quill he was.

Quill wants to help. He approaches Peter one night when he finds him sitting outside the Avenger’s base, looking up at the sky. In his hand, Quill has his walkman. Without talking, he approaches Peter and presses the small machine into his hands, and then presses play.

The music comes on. It’s Here Comes the Sun by the Beatles. Usually, Peter would make some smart remark about how old the song is, or how it’s in a funny movie he likes. But tonight he just listens. The lyrics are pure and quiet. Comforting, since it’s one of those songs that always seems to be playing somewhere, no matter where you go.

“Here comes the sun,” is the line that sticks with him the most. The sun will rise. He will get better. He won’t always be so scared.

After that night, he listens to the song on repeat every chance he gets. When he’s anxious, when he’s lonely, when he’s awake at night and the pictures won’t stop repeating in his head. The Avengers soon realize what the song means to him. Whenever he sleeps over at base to get away from the outside world, they can hear the song playing loudly in his room. When it plays, Clint, Tony, Steve, Natasha, Wanda, and the rest try to continue what they’re doing. But the atmosphere is always heavier, the light a little duller when they can hear “here comes the sun,” playing from Peter’s room.

“He was only fifteen,” says Thor in his booming voice after coming to visit, and having the source of the music explained to him. “It’s just not fair.”

“It’s alright,” continues the song in the other room, almost as an answer.

summary: Stony Fic Title: Not Better Left Unsaid (Can be read on Ao3) Rating: Mature Fandom: Avengers (Marvel)-all media types...
body:
Stony Fic

Title: Not Better Left Unsaid (Can be read on Ao3)

Rating: Mature

Fandom: Avengers (Marvel)-all media types

Relationships: Steve/Tony, Background Clint/Natasha

Additional tags: Fluff and angst, Emotional hurt comfort, Hurt Tony, Steve Rogers Feels, Minor injuries, post-2012 Avengers, Domestic Avengers, etc.

Chapters 1/?

Words: 1,539

Summary: The fight was over.

 They won, and Steve knows that.

So why does he feel like they’re the ones in the dark?

Call it intuition, cautiousness, paranoia even, but something isn’t right.

I tried to write something…idk man it was 3 a.m

summary: So rumor is that Fury is gonna have a cameo in SM:FFH and if it doesn't have to do with Tony (if they put him in the public cast...
body: So rumor is that Fury is gonna have a cameo in SM:FFH and if it doesn’t have to do with Tony (if they put him in the public cast we’ll know he lives so I’m choosing to believe they’re just keeping it from being a spoiler) then I hope it has to do with Peter’s parentage. His dad was recruited into the CIA by Fury (and he also had a sister named Teresa) and I really hope that’s something they bring to the screen

reblog.comment: So rumor is that Fury is gonna have a cameo in SM:FFH and if it doesn’t have to do with Tony (if they put him in the public cast we’ll know he lives so I’m choosing to believe they’re just keeping it from being a spoiler) then I hope it has to do with Peter’s parentage. summary: I have this weird headcanon that Tony Stark is like the fey in that once you accept food from him he never really goes away...
body:
I have this weird headcanon that Tony Stark is like the fey in that once you accept food from him he never really goes away again. Even if you leave he’s very likely to just, randomly show up, and try to take care of you. With varying levels of usefulness (alcohol is not a food group, neither is caffeine).

There is some evidence for this too, granted it’s very weak and purely circumstantial evidence but it’s there. Bruce Banner accepts some blueberries: gets access to Tony’s labs in Stark Tower. ((I might have that order of events wrong, it’s been forever since I watched that scene)) The rest of the Avengers accept his invitation to eat shawarma: everyone gets their own floor in the tower during the repairs! In Ironman 2 Fury has a coffee cup in front of him during his conversation with Tony in the donut shop: Tony expresses dissatisfaction over Fury having to turn to see all of his monitors on the helicarrier. (We never actually see Coulson eat anything, but it is implied that he was at Tony’s house for a couple of days during Ironman 2, so it’s probably safe to assume he ate the food at some point, and not only did Tony offer to fly him to Portland to see his SO, Tony was also pissed when he was killed.)

Once you accept food from Tony Stark you become one of Stark’s People and Stark takes care of his People. His methods are sometimes weird and usually a bit over the top, but it’s all because he cares.

summary: Tony: Who broke it? I’m not mad I just wanna know Peter: I did, I broke it- Tony: No, no you didn’t. Loki?  Loki: Don’t look at...
body:
Tony: Who broke it? I’m not mad I just wanna know

Peter: I did, I broke it-

Tony: No, no you didn’t. Loki?

Loki: Don’t look at me, look at Thor.

Thor: What? I didn’t break it

Loki: Huh, that’s weird, how’d you even know it was broken?

Thor: Because it’s sitting right in front of us and it’s broken

Loki: suspicious 

Thor: No it’s not

Bruce: If it matters, probably not, but Wanda was the last one to use it

Wanda: Liar! I don’t even drink that crap

Bruce: Oh really? Then what were you doing by the coffee cart earlier?

Wanda: I use the wooden stirrs to push back my cuticles, everyone knows that Bruce!

Peter: Okay let’s not fight, I broke it let me pay for it, Tony

Tony: No! Who broke it

Loki: Tony, Steve’s been awfully quiet 

Steve: Really?

Loki: Yeah really!

Everyone: Arguing

Tony: I broke it. I burned my hand so I punched it. I predict ten minutes from now they’ll be at each other’s throats with war painted on their faces and a pig head on a stick. Good, it was getting a little chummy around here

Loki: Tony, Steve’s been awfully quiet 

Steve: Really?

Loki: Yeah really!

Everyone: Arguing

Tony: I broke it. I burned my hand so I punched it. I predict ten minutes from now they’ll be at each other’s throats with war painted on their faces and a pig head on a stick. Good, it was getting a little chummy around here

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Intermediate
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LkZDfQ

by Nifawiwa

One more glance to his watch.

It was almost time for the second part.

His hands were itching for some action, his whole body slightly bouncing up and down. He once read that there are two types of people: some people were only concerned about arriving, and some adored the journey itself. Peter believed he belonged to both, however that worked.

Did she ask something from the store?

Memory failed him. It didn’t matter. 

Time!

Peter’s fingers wrapped tightly around the small device and he pressed the button on top of it with his thumb.

An underground explosion rumbled through the area and the rather large building shook dangerously, its foundations trembling. The concerned murmur was quickly replaced by worried and panicked shouts. People began to scramble, some while cursing considerably loudly.

…Ah jeez.

“That was a bit too strong, wasn’t it?..” Peter muttered, nibbling on his lower lip. He slapped his forehead with a groan. “Again! God, take note!”

…Hopefully that won’t cause any issues with them.

Not that it would matter that much.

***

Or the one where Peter plays for both sides.

Words: 3704, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, May Parker, Ned Leeds, Michelle Jones, Adrian Toomes, Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & May Parker
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, set after civil war, Not Spider-Man: Homecoming Compliant, because screw canon, who she, kinda dark Peter, depends on what you call dark really, basically Peter Parker gets Peter Darker, Anti-Villain Peter, The Stark internship is actually a Stark internship, Playing for both sides Peter, who am I kidding he plays for his own, Emotionally hurt Peter, Peter Needs a Hug, man I love that tag, Tony trying to act like Peter’s mentor, then Tony trying to act like Peter’s parental figure, May Parker is distressed, but is still wonderful, Peter Parker with a screwed up past, surprise, Peter Parker working alone, Mentally unstable Peter Parker, he’s not crazy though, Kinda, okay maybe a bit, BAMF Peter Parker, I realize this is not how tags work but screw it this is basically the summary by now so, will maybe add tags later if need be


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LkZDfQ

by MsCaptainWinchester (rons_pigwidgeon)

When Wade comes back from a failed extraction and finds out all his favorite people fell victim to Thanos, he’s not just going to sit back and let the asshole win.

OR The one where Wade saves the universe from the Giant Purple Douche, Deadpool style.

blog.title: Summerpipedream

Writer, gamer, multi-fandom shipmaker.
Writing | Moodboard | Buy me a Ko-fi

summary: Tagging @lovelyirony because I think you’ll like this one ;)  Consider - An au in which the only one killed in the car crash is...
body:
Tagging @lovelyirony because I think you’ll like this one ;) 

Consider - An au in which the only one killed in the car crash is Howard Stark. 

Maria and Howard get into an argument right before he peels away in his car. Honestly, Maria couldn’t even remember what they were arguing about, just that harsh words were exchanged, a glass of bourbon shattered against the wall.

So when Maria answers the door in the middle of the night, dressing gown wrapped tightly around herself, she was numb. 

For all that she told him to go to hell…she never actually mean it like that.

The wail of a baby interrupts her thoughts as she mechanically goes to soothe her baby Anthony, so small in his crib. 

What was she supposed to do now? 

How was she supposed to do this on her own?

Strong hands steer her gently to the couch, Edwin makes her a cup of tea. Ana fusses over Anthony, who settles as she rocks him. 

“We’re here for you Mrs. Stark. We’ll help you as best we can.”

It takes a few months, but eventually things are light in the house once again. Now it’s a regular occurrence to hear her son giggling as he crawls around, playing with Edwin and Ana. 

Peggy tries to drop by as much as she can, and adores spending time with her godson. Maria has never seen her son smile this much, and while she can’t but help feel guilty for thinking it, but…she didn’t think this would happen if Howard hadn’t been killed. 

To her surprise, Howard leaves her the owner of Stark Industries in his will. Probably because he expected it to go to Anthony and never actually to her, but nevertheless, Maria was now the owner of the growing Stark Industries. 

Her first step is to fire Obadiah Stane. 

Half of the board hates it, but Maria never liked how he spoke to her or Anthony, how his dark eyes would watch her and narrow when he thought she wasn’t looking. Thankfully, it seems like he’s made more enemies than friends, so with a majority vote, he was soon gone.

She brings in new board members, all of whom are willing to work with her and not sneer when she talks because she’s a woman. They don’t make things easy on her, but they start to listen to what she has to say, slowly but surely. 

It’s a lot of hard work. Not many respect her as much as they did Howard, and Maria was no stranger to the room falling silent as she enters a room. But every night, she goes home to tuck her son into bed and read him a bedtime story. 

She’s exhausted and has a million things to read and sign for the next morning but…she wouldn’t trade this for the world.

For her son, for her Tony, Maria persists.

title: Code Names (Parks and Rec)
body:
Tony: Okay, listen up folks, from now on we’ll be using code names you can address me as eagle one.

Tony: Steve, code name, ‘been there done that’

Tony: Stephen is ‘currently doing that’

Tony: Thor is ‘it happened once in a dream’

Tony: Pepper is ‘f I had to pick a girl’

Tony: Bucky is ‘eagle two’

Bucky: oh thank god

summary: our lady peace (is always in repair)
title: our lady peace (is always in repair)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uypABu

by tonyicarusstark

Anthony Edward Stark is born as an explosion— destructive and wild eyed, his hair soot dark and round cheeks ruddy with exertion.

Maria screams through his entire birth, loud and inconsolable while Howard sits at a desk half a city away, unknowing and uncaring.

The world keeps spinning even as the stars sing.

Anthony takes his first breath and the universe hums.

Words: 3580, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Pepper Potts, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Clint Barton, Thor (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Peggy Carter, Edwin Jarvis, Howard Stark
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Aunt Peggy Carter, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Fluff and Angst, Angst with a Happy Ending, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Tony-centric, Hurt Tony


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uypABu

blog.name: marvelficrec
blog.title: Marvel Fic Recs
blog.description:
A blog dedicated to finding all the best Tony Stark centric fic recs. Feel free to request what you want using the ask box! I specialize in stevetony, buckytony, and stevebuckytony.
check out the master lists!
angst | fluff | smut

tags: last night I was flirting with this dude that looked identical to Thomas middleditch
summary: Hi do you have any fics about Peter going on a field trip to stark towers and being embarrassed/ cares for by the avengers while...
question: Hi do you have any fics about Peter going on a field trip to stark towers and being embarrassed/ cares for by the avengers while his class mates are shocked. I just read “field trip” on ao3. Also anywhere Peter is generally cared for by the avengers or lives at stark towers. Love your account so much!!
answer:
I love these fics!!! I read like 5 in a row once!

He’s known as jr. - 4k

Petey Boy Goes on a Field Trip - 2k

The Field Trip - 8k

Field Trip to Home, Joy - 6k

Peter and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Field Trip - 1k - not a huge fan of this fic

It’s not just a cover - 4k

Last tour ever - 8k

The Decathlon Team Field Trip - 8k

Peter Parker and the Field Trip - 1k

The Trip - 1k

send more fic requests!
